messages.title: ONLY Liberal Democrat Josh Mason can beat Jeremy Corbyn's Labour here
The Conservatives have NEVER WON in this constituency
messages.content: and did nothing to stop the steel closure

messages.title: Only the Lib Dems have a record of beating Labour here

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Save the NHS by putting a penny in the pound on income tax to give the NHS and social care services the cash they need.
Boost the local economy with a major programme of capital investment for jobs.
Invest £7.5 billion extra in children's education. Triple the Early Years Pupil Premium to £1000.
Increase community policing, investing an extra £300 million a year in local police forces.
Two-thirds off bus travel for 16-21 year olds with a Young Person’s Bus Discount Card.
Limit the amount elderly people have to pay for social care. Keep the Triple Lock on our pensions. Make waiting times for mental health care match those for physical health care.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour candidate from Kent
mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservatives have never won in this constituency; Only Josh Mason can beat Labour; Local tactical voting situations implied

housing.content: Limit the amount elderly people have to pay for social care.
